sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-jobposter-layout', templateUrl: './jobposter-layout.component.html', styleUrls: ['./jobposter-layout.component.css'] }) export class JobposterLayoutComponent { sidebarCollapsed = false; toggleSidebar() { this.sidebarCollapsed = !this.sidebarCollapsed; } } 🚀 Job Portal Welcome! Job Poster
